add(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint.details: This vault DOES NOT support deflationary tokens  it expects that  the amount of transferred tokens would equal the actually deposited  amount. In practice this means that this vault DOES NOT support USDT  and similar tokens (that do not provide these guarantees).

params._allocPoint: Number of allocation points assigned to this pool
params._lockPeriod: A period between withdrawal request and a moment when it's executable
params._rewardPerBlock: Initial reward per block, in terms of _rewardToken

params._account: The account for which to claim rewards

params.adapterParams: The amount of gas required for BSC chain
params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to

params.adapterParams: The amount of gas required for BSC chain
params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to
params.expiry: The time at which to expire the signature
params.nonce: The contract state required to match the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

params._adapterParams: The amount of gas required for BSC chain
params._amount: The amount to deposit to vault

estimateFee(bytes,bytes).details: The estimated fees are the minimum required; it's recommended to increase the fees amount when sending a message. The unused amount will be refunded

params.adapterParams: The params used to specify the custom amount of gas required for the execution on the BSC chain
params.payload: The payload to be sent to the remote chain. It's computed as follows: payload = abi.encode(delegatee, ncheckpoints, blockNumber, votes, numCheckpoints[delegatee])

estimateFee(bytes,bytes).return: nativeFee The amount of fee in the native gas token (e.g. ETH)zroFee The amount of fee in ZRO token

params.account: The address to get votes balance

getCurrentVotes(address).return: The number of current votes for `account`

getEligibleWithdrawalAmount(address,uint.return: withdrawalAmount Amount that the user can withdraw

params.account: The address of the account to check
params.blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at

getRequestedAmount(address,uint256,addre.return: Total amount of requested but not yet executed withdrawals (including both executable and locked ones)

getUserInfo(address,uint256,address).return: amount Deposited amountrewardDebt Reward debt (technical value used to track past payouts)pendingWithdrawals Requested but not yet executed withdrawals

pendingReward(address,uint256,address).return: Reward the user is eligible for in this pool, in terms of _rewardToken

pendingWithdrawalsBeforeUpgrade(address,.return: beforeUpgradeWithdrawalAmount Total pending withdrawal amount in requests made before the vault upgrade

poolLength(address).return: Number of pools that distribute the specified token as a reward

params._adapterParams: The amount of gas required for BSC chain
params._amount: The amount to withdraw from the vault

params._allocPoint: Number of allocation points assigned to this pool

setAccessControl(address).details: Admin function to set the access control address

params.newAccessControlAddress: New address for the access control

params._primeToken: address of the prime token contract

params._rewardAmount: Number of allocation points assigned to this pool

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

estimateFee(bytes,bytes).notice: Estimates LayerZero fees for cross-chain message delivery to the remote chain

executeWithdrawal(address,uint256).notice: Execute withdrawal to XVSVault for XVS allocation

getCurrentVotes(address).notice: Gets the current votes balance for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the xvs stake balance for an account

getUserInfo(address,uint256,address).notice: Get user info with reward token address and pid

getWithdrawalRequests(address,uint256,ad.notice: Returns the array of withdrawal requests that have not been executed yet

pendingReward(address,uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending XVSs on frontend

pendingWithdrawalsBeforeUpgrade(address,.notice: Gets the total pending withdrawal amount of a user before upgrade

poolLength(address).notice: Returns the number of pools with the specified reward token

requestWithdrawal(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Request withdrawal to XVSVault for XVS allocation

set(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Update the given pool's reward allocation point

setAccessControl(address).notice: Sets the address of the access control of this contract

setPrimeToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Sets the address of the prime token contract

setRewardAmountPerBlock(address,uint256).notice: Update the given reward token's amount per block

setWithdrawalLockingPeriod(address,uint2.notice: Update the lock period after which a requested withdrawal can be executed

updatePool(address,uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date

userdoc.notice: The XVS Vault Dest allows XVS holders to lock their XVS to recieve voting rights in Venus governance and are rewarded with XVS, and sync their votes on BSC chain.
